channel.title: Machine Learning on Derek Helms
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Derek Helms

item.title: Stroke Prediction: Battle of the Learning Methods
item.description: Original GitHub Repository Alright, I’ll admit it… It sounded a lot cooler in my head. “Battle of the Learning Methods: Statistical vs Machine Learning”. Man vs. Machine (well not really, but you get the point). A test of speed, strength, learning, and maybe a little bit of overfitting. Maybe it’s just me that’s excited about the project, but I finally get to implement what I learn in school against what I do in my free time.

item.title: Global Food Production vs. Population: Predicting the Future
item.description: Original GitHub Repository Note: An in-depth data exploration section was also created, but will not be explored in this post. I will mainly focus on the modeling section, please refer to the GitHub link above for the DataExploration.ipynb notebook. The More The Merrier… Right? The current world population is nearly 7.8 billion people, and this number is estimated to rise to around 9.7 billion (or higher) in the year 2050.
